Hi all :slightly_smiling_face:
I'm Sjardo, living in Nijmegen (the Netherlands) and currently working <http://www.bureauvet.nl|www.bureauvet.nl>, after working for 3 years at <http://www.yoast.com|www.yoast.com> as a product-owner for their website :slightly_smiling_face: Going to dig into HubSpot SEO en development to see if it can compete to WordPress
